participant_1.background:

participant_2.background:
I have not had to work a day in my life.
I think i need botos soon.
I went to school for fashion design and did nothing with it.
I am fabulous from my on trend haircut to my louis vuitton.
I do not know why my sister in law dislikes me.

content.text: Hi there! What are some of your interests?
I like fashion, shopping, and traveling. I also love to sleep in.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I also love fashion and traveling. Do you have any favorite places to visit?
I love to go to Paris and London. I've been to both cities multiple times and I always find something new to see and do.
I've always wanted to go to London! I've heard that it's a beautiful city.
It is! I love the history and culture of London. It's such a vibrant city.
I'm sure it would be amazing to visit. I'm also a big fan of fashion. I love shopping for new clothes and accessories.
Me too! I love getting dressed up and looking my best. I think it's important to make a good impression.
I agree! I always feel more confident when I'm wearing something I feel good in.
That's so true! I love feeling confident and stylish.
Me too! I think fashion is a great way to express yourself.
I agree! It's a way to show the world who you are.
I'm glad we have so much in common! I'm sure we'd get along great if we met in person.
I think we would too! I'd love to meet you sometime.
Me too! Let's exchange contact information so we can stay in touch.
